data.title: 60 2010s TV Trivia Questions, Answers, and Fun Facts
data.meta_description: Over 60 trivia questions and answers about 2010s TV in our TV By Year category.  Did you know these fun bits of trivia and interesting bits of information?
data.text:
How much do you know about 2010s TV? This category is for trivia questions and answers related to 2010s TV (Television). Each one is filled with fun facts and interesting information.

Search in topic:

5 Which show from 2019 tells the story of a disaster at a nuclear power station?

Answer: Chernobyl

'Chernobyl' is a historical drama that tells the story of the 1986 disaster at the Chernobyl nuclear power plant in Ukraine and the clean up in the immediate aftermath. The series consisted of five episodes and was shown in the US and UK in 2019. The show was a joint production between the HBO network in the US and Sky TV in the UK.

Your options: [ Aftermath ] [ Homeland ] [ The 100 ] [ Chernobyl ]

From Quiz: 2010s: So Much Drama
